column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.1
#T_SP=webanno.custom.NEGATION|Negations
#Text=You mean Little Italy, Portugal, Kensington Market.
#Text=The Irish Ghetto of Cabbagetown.
#Text=Finnish in Thunder Bay.
#Text=The Finnish even have a city named after themselves New Finland, SK or Uusi Suomi, SK.
#Text=Ukrainians in parts of AB and SK.
#Text=The English are in West Island Montreal.
#Text=How dare they indeed.Maybe it is more complicated.
#Text=Is Markham Chinese, yes, but I also see lots of South Asians, Filipinos, etc also.
#Text=Looks like a richer version of Scarborough.
#Text=Brampton, lots of South Asians but lots of Blacks and others also .
#Text=We bring in mostly non-white immigrants.
#Text=Wherever we build houses and condos, there will be more of them there.
#Text=White people in the Beaches are not exactly moving out with immigrants replacing them.
#Text=The diversity is fairly well spread out and mixed, in Brussels, it's different.
#Text=I was there in 2014.
#Text=The quality of immigrants is also different.U of T, Waterloo, York, Ryerson, etc looks a lot more diverse than Toronto.
#Text=Universite de Bruxelle does not look like Brussels.
#Text=Big difference.
